Summary: I saw a light that looked like a star but knew it wasnt
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the traylor and i Went and sat on the porch but felt like i shouldnt be outside it was dark and i was watching the stars i noticed this one that looked like it was moving back and forth then it flew at me really fast I thought it was going to hit me and crash I jumped up opened the door and ran inside screaming and told my husband and mother in law and my husbands nephew they said that it couldnt be so and i opened the door and looked and it was setting in its original spot in the sky i pointed it out to them but they didnt believe me i know the beings were messing with me because i had seen a ufo up close a few nights before and i closed the door and didnt go back outside that night
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Cordova
There were no other sightings in Cordova on or around July 20th 2010
